text.section:
A repository shall:
Maintain records of donated prescription drugs and medical supplies; and
Submit periodic reports to the Board on its activities.

To determine compliance with the requirements of this subtitle, the Board shall:
Inspect designated drop-off sites and repositories;
Inspect records of donated prescription drugs and medical supplies maintained by the repository; and
Beginning January 1, 2007, and each January 1 thereafter, report to the Governor and, in accordance with § 2-1246 of the State Government Article, the General Assembly on the operation of the Program.
